headline.main: McKayla Maroney Stepping Away From Competition

snippet: The two-time Olympic medalist McKayla Maroney, 20, said she was stepping away from competition but not “retiring” from gymnastics. “I’m never leaving this sport,” she told the podcast GymCastic.
lead_paragraph: The two-time Olympic medalist McKayla Maroney, 20, said she was stepping away from competition but not “retiring” from gymnastics. “I’m never leaving this sport,” she told the podcast GymCastic.
